website_summaries.verdict: A solid wood table designed to accentuate many family gatherings.
pros: Customers love the value and easy assembly
Extremely well-made set exceeds the expectations of many
We love the simplicity and inviting look

customer_reviews.title: Table top comes pre assembled, just put on legs. Chairs easy too
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the easiest furniture to put together. Most pieces are pre assembled. You can see the pics. It is a small table but it is perfect size for my little nook. Converted living room to living rm/dining rm.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H

customer_reviews.title: Small apartment table set - wood is delicate
customer_reviews.text: This table set is a good size for a small to medium sized apartment. The built-in table leaf is a good bonus. You can't fit two chairs side by side even with the leaf extended. The assembly took about 2 hours, with the chairs taking up the most time. While assembling, one of the chair legs split due to the threaded metal insert separating the wood along the grain while tightening. I'm hoping to get one leg replaced without buying an additional set of chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom's apartment. She doesn't need a big table but an option to expand it was very appealing. I purchased this based on the reviews and I was pleasantly surprised. I thought my mom would need help assembling it but she did it on her own and says it was easy. The quality is solid and the coloring is darker than my screen showed but it is a good thing. There's also no smell which I like. Some varnish smell toxic and awful and take time to air out but this was fine. If you're in the edge, get it! Great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Eats

customer_reviews.title: Great Table & Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: The quality exceeded my expectations. Very quick delivery and well packaged in three boxes. Simple assembly; the table was a snap attaching only the four legs, the chairs took a bit more time but was a straightforward assembly. The color is a deep rich mahogany and both table and chairs are very sturdy. I couldn't be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JoPa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assembly. Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Tuesday. Delivered on Friday. Forgot to tell husband. OOPS! Oh Well! Assembly was a breeze. Only looked at directions for 1 chair. Did not need for other three. Table did not even look at directions. No damage to carton when delivered. All pieces, and screws were there. Quality materials used. Chairs tuck under without sticking out. Roomy seating for 4 without leaf. Looks like it will seat 6 comfortably when extended. Fits in dining area just like I pictured it. Would highly recommend. Looked for quite a while before deciding on this set. Price is exceptional. Yes husband likes it to! Again very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E Rusiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Came with a few scuffs and dings. But nothing too noticeable and I still love it. Perfect size for what I needed and absolutely beautiful color and sturdy wood. I plan to get one of those wood stain markers and the dings were relatively small and probably only noticeable to me because I’m mentally insane with OCD. Over all a great buy. Do it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amie2814

customer_reviews.title: Love My Set
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was excellent , came before promised time and all parts were very well packed and it perfect condition. We love our set, it is a strong well made set! It looks beautiful in our small dining room, fits just right. I was so pleased withe the color oak. We had it put together in no time. Once you get one chair the others are a snap and the table is just putting on 4 legs. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This set was a wonderful surprise! It went together quite easily, and the overall quality and finish are very nice. It's a joy just to feel this set!
customer_reviews.author: Customer Pete

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this set very much. I have to say I was surprised! Some of reviews I read weren't promising, but I took the chance. I think those people's expectations were way too high! It's a great fit for just my husband and I. The leaf is handy if we have a couple guests. And it was for the kitchen. We have a dining room table and chairs if we need more room.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Stallsmith

customer_reviews.title: Decent but at this price don't expect high quality
customer_reviews.text: We received the three boxes quickly and in good condition. Putting together the chairs took some time and effort but it was fairly easy for the table. There are two noticeable defects (and other hidden ones) but we'll fix them with a wood pen. The insert didn't fit properly and it took a lot of work to get it level with the rest of the table. That being said, for the price, ti will serve its purpose. My guess is that that finish will start chipping soon so we're being careful. I'll update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Trailing Spouse

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great for our house! My Family of three fits great around it, but if my parents come to visit we are still comfortable! Wood and finish are good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non MDF, non veneer
customer_reviews.text: Ships in 3 boxes, 1 table, 2x2 chairs. Chairs were well padded during shipping. & assembly was a breeze. Table has a small nick on a corner, but hidable with a table cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table and chair set. The do seem to be of great quality, and very sturdy. I hand tightened everything and did use a dab of wood glue to help ensure nothing got loose. Nice finish. Great for a small family of 4. I would recommend a larger table for anything more then 4 people.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BWARE OR YOU WILL BE RETURNING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. Sub quality. Chipped and poor construction out of the box. Have left 4 messages(same name on all 4 different extensions) no one responds. Table leaf unable to open..... it is also a different color from table. Nothing worse than them stating to contact them for assistance and getting no one! Also their address is in 2 different states(TX AND MD) and when you send an email it’s returned.....”unable to send to this address”...........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Fine — Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually a pretty good looking table, but it scratches super easily. Too expensive for cheap material, but it’s getting the job done until we can get a better kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: AKB71489

customer_reviews.title: very strong and sturdy. Good wood and I like the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering a dining set online. I order lots of item from amazon and have not had any complaints on any of my purchases so I gave it a try. I needed this color and size. the set is much nicer than I expected, very strong and sturdy. Good wood and I like the fact that it has the leaf to make it larger when I need too. Nice set , nice price, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This works great in our breakfast nook. We actually use it more than our dinning table. The wood is a little soft in that you need to careful with little ones and forks.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra M. Norcross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and extremely well made set that is very reasonably priced! The quality is sturdy and all hard wood. We were hesitant due to not being able to see it first, but we're incredibly happy when it arrived. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mdcof3

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Sturdy. Very nice finish. Small but exactly what I needed. Chairs are comfortable. 4 stars bc of how it shipped. The box was terrible condition. I was Concerned about any damages. Luckily there was none on the table. One chair has a small but noticeable dent/scratch. Not sure if it was just the delivery guy or what, but I’ve definitely had better experiences with deliveries.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Solid tables and chairs
customer_reviews.text: One leg piece for a chair missing a pre-drilled screw hole Update: 12/3/18 Contacted manufacturer and got a replacement part. Table and chairs are stable and good quality. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Came scratched
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back. The hardware was not secured in the package, so it ended up scratching the surface of the table. It seemed like it would be sturdy, but it was just too badly scratched to pay full price for a brand new table. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn VT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Came with a crank on the table. Why why why does it happen
customer_reviews.author: jinkey d.

customer_reviews.title: Came in very damaged I have lots of pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I was so sad because it came with so much scratches and dents and chips. Not worth it even the box was damaged. The box was so heavy I didn't know how to send it back. Well I keep it 400 hundred down the drain. I will never buy furniture from here again.
customer_reviews.author: YANIRA FRANCO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our small dinning room
customer_reviews.text: We love this table it fits in our small dinning room. The leaf is easy to use when you need a little extra space. The chairs are sturdy and pretty comfortable. The table looks great. It was not difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal, the size was more perfect for our space then expected, very beautiful sturdy set, you will need to put some grip on the table legs though depending on your floor type, we have real tile and it slides easily, nothing some grip tape couldn't resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for the small dining space in my first apartment. It was fairly easy to put together. Except for one of the chair screws that didn’t want to go in. I think it was cross threaded.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Was easy enough to assemble and looks great in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: has a few dings, but that's what you get when you order it by mail. Was easy enough to assemble and looks great in my kitchen. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: assembly wasn't too bad
customer_reviews.text: I promise it's the same table. This was a long project and sanding, painting and new seat covers. The chairs arent the sturdiest but they hold enough. The price in my opinion is a bit high for the quality of materials though but over decent table set
customer_reviews.author: Laray

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Table and chairs were very easy to assemble. They look more expensive than they are. They survived TWO moves, which is more than I can say for the IKEA furniture I've purchased in the past. Being able to extend the table is great.
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: There was slight damage to the edge of the tabletop from a drop in shipment I assume, but the quality and features made up for it (plus the discount offered to keep it as is).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: The table came just as expected. Set up was a breeze, color was as expected. Will recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: sophiemekia

customer_reviews.title: Solid high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and easy to assemble. The extension is smarty hidden but works great. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table and chairs from solid wood!
customer_reviews.text: It was a good assembly, but 2 holes in one of the chairs had misaligned holes by a 1/4". Had to pull out my drill and fix it, but not a big deal for me. Great craftsmanship and beautiful set. See pictures for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marolla

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The quality is way better than I thought...first table came damaged but was replaced by a new one.would have given a 4 star but quality was to good to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed to downsize and get a smaller dining room table. Could not find what I wanted in furniture stores. Style is either very large or tall which wasn’t what I was looking for. So I took a gamble and ordered this. Easy to put together, chairs are very sturdy. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: James Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for smaller dining spaces
customer_reviews.text: We don't have the largest dining area and this fits perfectly with the option to expand for when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Addict

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Leaf is not solid. It stores in the table and has a fold spot right in the middle. Doesn't say that in description. Would not buy again and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. Very easy to put together. Great quality, very sturdy. I can't believe I waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Great for small office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an office kitchenette and it works great. 4 stars instead of 5 because 2 of the 4 chairs have uneven legs and therefore rock. I would still purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: TXGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality well priced
customer_reviews.text: No veneers or fake wood. Attractive and solid. If you want a nice set for a small space, this is it. Assembling the chairs takes a while, but it’s worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine set which will look quite nice in the kitchen. Delivery was prompt and set-up fairly straightforward. The chairs were a bit trickier than the table – hint:. There's a reason they differentiate between right and left legs. Allen wrenches included but you will need a small Phillips.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Figure out how to carry 80 pound boxes into your home, by yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly from Amazon. Delivery person set boxes in front of door. I couldn’t get out the front door. He moved he boxes down the 3 steps for me to get out of the house. Then promptly left with me struggling to get an 80 pound box up the stairs and into the house. Easy to assemble, sturdy, pleasing style.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, nicely finished, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Solid wood. Easy to assemble (everything fits nicely).
customer_reviews.author: AlexS

customer_reviews.title: Nice table!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I imagined. Using it as a conference table at work and it's absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Table set
customer_reviews.text: Bet table set ever, good quality purchased for an elderly one ,,would highly recommend, quick delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size table if u only need small table
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy table and chairs for 4 people maximum. Good material and well made.
customer_reviews.author: STach

customer_reviews.title: Defective and missing several pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size of screws included. Table defective and only received 2 sets of chairs legs instead of 4. Very upsetting and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dining set for an apartment. Sturdy materials, easy assembly, comfortable chairs. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.text: The quality and look are great. Solid wood that can last a long time with good care.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Very Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly & was thrilled with my beautiful new dining set for 6. Cannot believe the value. We couldn't find USED furniture this inexpensive! Really happy with this purchase. Highly recommend it! We got the Dark Mahogany Look Very rich looking.
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, and looks great. Chairs are comfortable and sturdy. Good packaging and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Allen C Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table and comfy chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great table for a small dining room holds up and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Kruiz bonenfant

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with the quality of this furniture for the price. I would also like to commend this company for their packing process. Excellent protection.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Leary

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs are made of solid wood, have a nice finish, nicely apolstered cushions and are built solid. Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Francis

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy table set and it looks nice. The chair is a little hard to assemble, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jean W.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, solid wood
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our kitchen. Well made, sturdy and the chairs are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Good value - good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money; easy to assemble and well built.
customer_reviews.author: ChaosInc

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are not comfortable to sit in - even with the cushion, they are hard.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and attractive piece of furniture. Easy to assemble but took my time over a couple days. I think this will last a long time. One of my best online purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and as described. I am very happy with the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good table bad chairs
customer_reviews.text: The holes did not line up on the chairs. They remain incomplete. I have tried to contact seller with no avail. It’s a very nice table so I’m giving it some credit.
customer_reviews.author: RachelGold

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: I have limited space in my kitchen/dining area, this table is the perfect size. I feel like I have more room and the table is beautiful. I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great table, easy to assemble. No tools required as it comes with everything you'll need. Perfect for my small kitchen/apartment.
customer_reviews.author: robert w.

customer_reviews.title: Color Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Would have kept the product if the color matched the picture. It was much darker than the picture .
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my small home. Exactly was I was looking for. Easy to assemble, sturdy and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Two of the four chairs were not level. Table had a big dent on one corner.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I would say the best value for money and so easy to assemble. The wood is good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Vadivelu Karunakaran

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great quality,easy to assemble! Just what they said it would be! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the table
customer_reviews.text: The table was damaged when we opened the box. The box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: these dinning tables are just the best. i shopped everywhere and this table is by ...
customer_reviews.text: i dont normally rate anything even tho i buy a ton of sh1t on amazon, these dinning tables are just the best. i shopped everywhere and this table is by far the cheapest, with FREE shipping,plus the QUality is amazing and easy to install. one of the best purchases. seriously
customer_reviews.author: Hong Wang

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dining set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dining set. Substantial and easy to assemble. The only flaw is a slight discoloration along one edge, but not really noticeable. I would highly recommend this dinette.
customer_reviews.author: Jana B

customer_reviews.title: Dining Table & Chairs
customer_reviews.text: It came ln great shape, and was very easy to assemble. It fits my needs nicely. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Goggin

customer_reviews.title: wonderful buy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set and just the right size for the studio apartment.
customer_reviews.author: writenstamp

customer_reviews.title: Good product @ agood price
customer_reviews.text: A good value-priced set. The finish could be better, how-ever over-all I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Brady

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with the help purchasing this set
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with the help purchasing this set. The assistance was wonderful and the price awesome ! I could not get it anywhere ! Thank you so much ! I was also so surprised , when they deliver it a week earlier ! Keep up the good work ! Denise.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Price is high compared to market otherwise everything perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery and packaging is perfect. But I have quoted 3 star just because price is high if we compare the same quality of dining table in market.
customer_reviews.author: Sourav

product_meta.title: 5 Pc dinette set - Dining Tables for small spaces and 4 Chairs for Dining room
product_meta.description: Style Name:NOFK5-OAK-WHave supper in high end and remarkably comfort with Norfolk dinette table sets. This kitchen table set gives high quality style and design with a touch of class to provide dynamic elegance to any small dining table. A handy 12 inch self-storage extendable leaf gives more space. Norfolk kitchen table sets are constructed from the best Asian wooden. Wood or upholstered seats present gorgeous style and design and ease and comfort to this table set. Include: Norfolk 5 piece Set includes one rectangular dinette table with 12in extension leaf and 4 matching dinette kitchen chairs with wood seat.
feature_bullets: Norfolk 5 piece set includes one rectangular dinette table with 12in extension leaf and 4 matching dinette kitchen chairs with wood seat
High class dining chairs which constructed with 100-Percent Asian hardwood
basically no MDF, veneer, laminate moved to our goods

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
